data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Spiritual resistance increased by 252.

data.name: Anger Drives Me
data.description: Your chance to Parry is increased by 3% per 10 Hatred.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Armor of Eternal Servitude
data.description: The magic infusing your armor springs to life, further increasing your armor by 990 and restoring 2400 health over 20 seconds.

data.name: Away, Cretins!
data.description: No longer able to bear looking upon your opponents, you knockback everyone within 30 feet of you for 600 damage. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Banish Weakness
data.description: A cry of rage removes all Hexes, Curses, and Ailments from you. You will regain 50 AP and 300 health for each effect removed.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 471 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Malignant Strike!
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Requires 9 points in Path of Malice
data.description: An overwhelming attack which deals 194 damage and knocks the victim down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Blast of Hatred
data.description: You spread a wave of malicious loathing towards all the peons 40 feet in front of you. So searing is this hate that those in your path move 40% slower and suffer 1600 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Bolstering Anger
data.note:
Costs 10 Hatred every 3 seconds.
Requires 13 points in Path of Anguish
data.description: You focus your Hatred inward, cursing yourself for your weakness, and force yourself to march on by recovering 290 health every 3 seconds for up to 30 seconds. This effect will end if you run out of Hate.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Brutal Smash
data.description:
A vicious blow to the head that deals 373 damage and increases the Strength by 75 and also increasing Willpower based on Hatred for the next 20 seconds.
Your Dark Protector will receive increased Strength and Willpower if they are within 50 feet.
With 25 Hate: Willpower increased by 75.
With 50 Hate: Willpower increased by 150.
With 75 Hate: Willpower increased by 225.
With 100 Hate: Willpower increased by 300.

data.name: Bulwark
data.description: Repairs a friendly keep door for 5% of it's total health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Chains of Hatred
data.description: Taken aback by your seething contempt, up to 4 enemies within 30 feet are rooted in place, making them unable to move for 10 seconds. Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Chaotic Allegiance
data.description: You receive an additional 5% morale gain for every Chaos in your group.

data.name: Choking Fury
data.note:
Costs 20 Hatred
Requires 5 points in Path of Anguish
data.description: A particularly insulting strike that deals 423 damage and causes your target to spend an additional 20 Action Points whenever they activate an ability for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Combat Awareness
data.description: 5% Increased EXP in Realm vs. Realm combat

data.name: Crimson Death
data.note:
Costs 30 Hatred
Requires Great Weapon
Requires 13 points in Path of Malice
data.description: A great cleave that strikes all targets 40 feet in front of you for 523 damage and making them 10% more likely to be critically hit by others for 5 seconds.

data.name: Crippling Anger
data.description: A maiming strike that allows you to further toy with your opponent by reducing their movement speed by 40% and dealing 265 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Crush The Weak
data.description:
A heartless attack that inflicts 348 damage and target's Critical hit chance will be reduced based on your Hate.
With 25 Hate: Critical chance reduced 5%.
With 50 Hate: Critical chance reduced 10%.
With 75 Hate: Critical chance reduced 15%.
With 100 Hate: Critical chance reduced 20%.

data.name: Crush Vitality
data.description: Anytime you strike an opponent, you have a 25% chance to lower that opponent' autoattack speed by 20% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Crushing Anger
data.description:
A surge of malevolence slams into your foe dealing 398 damage and interrupting them. Will also reduce your opponent's Action Points based on your Hate.
With 30 Hate: Reduce AP by 10.
With 60 Hate: Reduce AP by 20.
With 90 Hate: Reduce AP by 30.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.

data.name: Dark Elf Lineage
data.description: You receive an additional 5% morale gain for every Dark Elf in your group.

data.name: Dark Protector
data.description:
The Witch King has tasked you with watching over one of your pitiful allies. You gain 5 Hatred whenever an enemy dares to attack your protected ally.
This effect can not occur more than once per second.

data.name: Deflect Oil
data.description: 10% reduction in damage taken by Oil siege engines. You will also protect two other group mates within 30 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that reduces armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Driven By Hate
data.description: Fueled by your hatred, you push yourself ever onward and regain 160 Action Points.

data.name: Dwarf Bane
data.description: You inflict 2% more damage against Dwarfs in PvP

data.name: Dwarfs Fear Me
data.description: Killing Dwarfs will reduce the morale of any opponents nearby at death.

data.name: Efficient Slaughter
data.description: Hate spending abilities cost 5 less Hate to use.

data.name: Elite Training
data.description:
For up to 10 seconds your superior training allows you to easily Parry the next 4 attacks made against you. Any defense made in this time will restore Action Points to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you based on your Hatred.
With 30 Hate: Restores 5 AP.
With 60 Hate: Restores 10 AP.
With 90 Hate: Restores 15 AP

data.name: Empire Bane
data.description: You inflict 2% more damage against Empire in PvP

data.name: Endless Pursuit
data.description: When disrupting an enemy spell you gain a 30% speed boost for 5 seconds and gain 40 Action Points.

data.name: Enraged Beating
data.note: Requires 5 points in Path of Malice
data.description: A flurry of blows that inflicts 110 damage every half second for 3 seconds. Any of these hits that critical will restore 10 Hate.

data.name: Exile
data.description:
An overwhelming blow that deals 423 damage and will knockback your target based on your Hate.
With 30 Hate: Medium Knockback.
With 60 Hate: Long Knockback.
With 90 Hate: Very Long Knockback.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Feeding On Pain
data.description:
Reduce AP cost of Loathing abilities based on your current Health level.
With 75-51% Health: Reduce cost by 25%.
With 50-26% Health: Reduce cost by 50%.
With 25-0% Health: Reduce cost by 75%.

data.name: Feeding On Weakness
data.description:
The pathetic display of fighting skill shown by your opponent instills an even greater urge to destroy them. You lash out for 348 damage and increase your Toughness by 75 for 20 seconds and will recover health based on your Hate and damage inflicted.
Your Dark Protector will regain health and receive increased Toughness if they are within 50 feet.
With 30 Hate: Recovers 25% of damage inflicted.
With 60 Hate: Recovers 50% of damage inflicted.
With 90 Hate: Recovers 75% of damage inflicted.

data.name: Filled With Fury
data.description: Increase chance to critically hit by 15% for 5 seconds whenever you expend Hate to attack.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: For Glory!
data.description: 5% Increased Renown earned when fighting players in Scenarios

data.name: Force of Fury
data.note: Requires 9 points in Path of Fury
data.description:
Your intense fury allows you to shrug off the greatest of hits. For 10 seconds your Armor is increased by 618 and you will become less likely to be Critically hit depending on your Hatred.
With 30 Hate: 15% less likely to be Critically hit.
With 60 Hate: 30% less likely to be Critically hit.
With 90 Hate: 45% less likely to be Critically hit.

data.name: Furious Howl
data.description: A bone chilling howl that strikes fear in all opponents 30 feet from you. Those affected suffer 150 damage and their chance to Block and Parry is reduced by 10% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Guard
data.description: You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Hastened Doom
data.description: Whenever you critically hit a target their Wounds are reduced by 120 for 10 seconds. In addition, whenever you strike a target with Murderous Wrath or Pitiless Strike your auto attack speed is increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Hateful Strike
data.description: A vindictive blow that deals 348 damage and builds double threat.

data.name: High Elf Bane
data.description: You inflict 2% more damage against High Elves in PvP

data.name: High Elves Fear Me
data.description: Killing High Elves will reduce the morale of any opponents nearby at death.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Horrific Wound
data.description:
Cuts open a vicious wound, dealing 373 damage and weakens the victim's armor based on Hatred.
With 25 Hate: Armor reduced by 200.
With 50 Hate: Armor reduced by 400.
With 75 Hate: Armor reduced by 600.
With 100 Hate: Armor reduced by 800.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: In Malekith's Name!
data.description: A fierce curse in the Witch Kings name brings overwhelming pain to those who hear it. Opponents within 30 feet of you receive 1200 damage and are Silenced for 5 seconds.

data.name: Invigorating Victory - Dwarf
data.description: Killing Dwarfs will double your AP regen rate 10% of the time.

data.name: Invigorating Victory - Empire
data.description: Killing Empire will double your AP regen rate 10% of the time.

data.name: Invigorating Victory - High Elf
data.description: Killing High Elves will double your AP regen rate 10% of the time.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Khaine's Warding
data.description: Khaine's favor shines on those with strength and skill, so for the next 10 seconds anytime anyone in your group blocks an attack, each group member within 100 feet regains 800 health.

data.name: King of the Hill
data.description: 5% Increased Renown earned when fighting players in Skirmish

data.name: King Slayer
data.description: 5% Increased Damage vs. Kings

data.name: Looter
data.description: 5% Increased Gold in Realm vs. Realm combat

data.name: Malekith's Bulwark
data.description: Reduces all magical damage that you take to 75%, but also reduces all healing used on you by 15%.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Mind Killer
data.description: A vile attack that crushes your target's will to live, inflicting 127 damage and lowering their Intelligence and Willpower by 25 for 20 seconds. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times.

data.name: Mission Focused
data.description: 5% Increased Renown earned when fighting players in Objectives

data.name: Modify War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You shield the Ram absorbing 1500 damage over the next 30 seconds.

data.name: Monstrous Rending
data.description: A sweeping strike that rakes across targets up to 25 feet in front of you for 183 damage

data.name: Monstrous Ruin
data.description: Monstrous Rending cost 10 less Hate to use.

data.name: Murderous Wrath
data.description: A piercing blow that deals 373 damage and ignores 25% of your target's armor.

data.name: Nemesis
data.description: Receive 5% less damage from Kings

data.name: None Shall Pass
data.note:
Requires Shield
Requires 5 points in Path of Loathing
data.description: You ready your blade and defiantly raise your shield to increase your Block rate by 50% for up to 10 seconds. Any time you block during this time you will lash out at your attacker for 126 damage and gain 5 Hatred.

data.name: Orcish Camaraderie
data.description: You receive an additional 5% morale gain for every Greenskin in your group.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Pitiless Feeding
data.description: Increases durations of Pitiless Strike, Mind Killer, and Terrifying Foe by 10 seconds.

data.name: Pitiless Strike
data.description: A merciless attack that weakens your target, dealing 271 damage and reducing their Toughness by 75 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: Repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Refreshing Dominance - Dwarf
data.description: Killing Dwarfs will restore a small amount of health.

data.name: Refreshing Dominance - Empire
data.description: Killing Empire will restore a small amount of health.

data.name: Refreshing Dominance - High Elf
data.description: Killing High Elves will restore a small amount of health.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Increases Toughness by 160.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.description: You shatter one Enchantment from your enemy and deal 151 damage.

data.name: Shield of Rage
data.description: Your overwhelming hate shields you from up to 625 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Shielding Anger
data.description: Your chance to Disrupt is increased by 3% per 10 Hatred.

data.name: Simmering Anger
data.description:
Gain 10 Hate each time an enemy critically hits you.
This effect can only trigger once every second.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Soul Killer
data.description: Mind Killer will now reduce all healing cast by the target to 50%

data.name: Spiteful Slam
data.description:
A fierce strike that slams your opponent to the ground, dealing 262 damage and knocking them down for 2 seconds or more based on Hate.
With 30 Hate: Knocks down for 3 seconds.
With 60 Hate: Knocks down for 4 seconds.
With 90 Hate: Knocks down for 5 seconds.

data.name: Swift Fury
data.description: Attacks that spend Hatred have a 25% chance to increase Acton Point regen by 100% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Terrifying Foe
data.description:
Hateful Strike will now increase your Toughness for 20 seconds based on your Hate.
With 30 Hate: Increase Toughness by 15%.
With 60 Hate: Increase Toughness by 30%.
With 90 Hate: Increase Toughness by 45%.

data.name: The "Empire" Fears Me
data.description: Killing Empire will reduce the morale of any opponents nearby at death.

data.name: Thirst For Death
data.description: Whenever you critically hit you gain 10 Hatred. This will not occur more than once per second.

data.name: Throw Dagger
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 104 damage. Has a chance to deal 703 damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Town Raider
data.description: 5% Increased Renown earned when fighting players in Cities

data.name: Unstoppable Fury
data.description: Detaunts are dispelled automatically when applied to you.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Wave of Scorn
data.description: A great wave spreads 40 feet in front of you, inflicting 284 damage and reducing movement by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rebounding Hatred
data.description: You focus on your Glaive with great vitriol, forming a veil of Hatred between you and your opponent. Your chance to Dodge, Disrupt and Parry attacks are increased by 50%, and whenever you defend against an attack, you will reflect back 130 damage.
